description: ExternalMetricStatus indicates the current value of a global metric not associated with any Kubernetes object.

currentAverageValue.description: currentAverageValue is the current value of metric averaged over autoscaled pods.

currentValue.description: currentValue is the current value of the metric (as a quantity)

metricName.description: metricName is the name of a metric used for autoscaling in metric system.

metricSelector.description: metricSelector is used to identify a specific time series within a given metric.
